definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: Sticking to the Pepole Oriented conception, our company has brought in professional talent.
sentences.chinese: 本公司堅持以人爲本的理念，大力引進相關專業人才。

sentences.english: The Chinese side will continue to help Cambodia train various professionals.
sentences.chinese: 中方將繼續幫助柬培訓各類專業人才。

sentences.english: Professionals know how to be empathetic.
sentences.chinese: 專業人才懂得如何跟別人感同身受。

sentences.english: Being a polytechnic, we should take the responsibility of training applied electronics personnel.
sentences.chinese: 作爲高職院校負有培養電子應用專業人才的重任。

sentences.english: But a new India demanded the reconstitution of a professional class.
sentences.chinese: 但是新印度需要一大批的專業人才。

sentences.english: The idea of system security is the soul in professional training of safety engineering.
sentences.chinese: 安全工程專業人才的培養，系統安全的思想是靈魂。

definition: every trade/all professions/all walks of life
practice (customary action, as opposed to theory)/practical
employee/person employed in a trade or profession
